channel.title: San Bernardino on Police Overhead
channel.description: Recent content in San Bernardino on Police Overhead

item.title: San Bernardino County Sheriff - March 2021
item.description: In March 2021, San Bernardino County Sheriff flew 13 aircraft for a total of 471 hours. There were 527 flights. The longest was 4.90 hours

item.title: San Bernardino County Sheriff - February 2021
item.description: In February 2021, San Bernardino County Sheriff flew 11 aircraft for a total of 390 hours. There were 438 flights. The longest was 5.17 hours

item.title: San Bernardino County Sheriff - January 2021
item.description: In January 2021, San Bernardino County Sheriff flew 12 aircraft for a total of 353 hours. There were 494 flights. The longest was 4.76 hours

item.title: San Bernardino County Sheriff - November 2020
item.description: In November 2020, San Bernardino County Sheriff flew 8 aircraft for a total of 261 hours. There were 350 flights. The longest was 3.70 hours

item.title: San Bernardino County Sheriff - October 2020
item.description: In October 2020, San Bernardino County Sheriff flew 9 aircraft for a total of 263 hours. There were 343 flights. The longest was 4.06 hours
